question: The very first edition of Good Air Summit-2019 was organised in which city recently?
explanation: The 1st edition of the Good Air Summit is a part of a larger movement for Good Air by health advocacy IHW Council that seeks to reach 50 crore people by 2025. The first of its kind people\'s-led initiative seeks to make environment a prominent public health issue. Students of 17 educational institutions, including schools, colleges, universities, and research institutions brimmed with joy as they saw 10 students being awarded with the title of \'Young Ambassadors of Good Air\'.
